short_summary: Procurement of ball valves for CFSD Montreal
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Valve, Ball
#### Solicitation Number
W8482-231311/A
#### Date of Publication
2023-02-23
#### Tender Closing Date and Time
2023-04-04T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for 2 valves, model 44-7777TT-SE-V2-M1, NCAGE: 38003. The delivery location is 25 Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) in Montreal, Quebec. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.

#### Product Specification
* GSIN Number: 4820
* Product Title: Valve, Ball
* NCAGE: 38003
* Part Number: 44-7777TT-SE-V2-M1
* Quantity: 2
* Unit of Issue: EA
* Trade Agreements: CFTA, CPFTA, CCHFTA, CAHTFTA, CAPTA, CCKFTA, ALEC

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions regarding this bid, please contact Jean-Pierre Normandin at jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca or 819-939-3674. The Directorate for Maritime Procurement, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2 can be reached via email or phone.

#### Supporting Documentation
The tender package can be accessed at the following link
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/23/7d5bf66b8b3cb6242f0a7393fb79e6aa/rfp_w8482-231311-a-en.pdf
or
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/23/5b7257331eae44a80575153bd9405687/rfp_w8482-231311-a-fr.pdf

#### Notes
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE they are offering.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
